features.name: Authentication & User Management
features.description: Handles user login, registration, and profile management using Supabase Auth.

features.name: Game Integrations (Minecraft/Discord)
features.description: Links web accounts to Minecraft and Discord identities, managing role synchronization and data display.

features.name: Dashboard & Statistics
features.description: Displays user statistics, playstyle analysis (radar chart), and achievements.

features.name: Forum System
features.description: A community forum with categories, threads, polls, and markdown support.

features.name: Admin Panel
features.description: Administrative interface for managing users, tickets, news, and events.

features.name: Economy & Shop
features.description: Gacha system, donation management, and virtual currency handling.

features.name: Component Library / Storybook
features.description: Extensive collection of UI components with defined stories for isolated testing and edge case validation.
